'''''When One Gazes Into the Abyss...''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. This achievement is earned upon completing ''[[In the Depths, an Unexpected Reunion]]''.

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to the famous quote by {{w|Friedrich Nietzshe}}: "He who fights with monsters should look to it that he himself does not become a monster. And if you gaze long into an abyss, the abyss also gazes into you."
